text: Dumaya, chto ikh Pisaniye samoye luchsheye, iudei govoryat: "Bud'te iudeyami, togda poydote pravednym putom." A khristiane govoryat: "Bud'te khristianami, togda poydote pravednym putom." Skazhi im (o Mukhammad!): "Vashi very byli iskazheny, a nash put' - eto put' Ibrakhima, ved' on ne byl iz mnogobozhnikov. My verim v islam, kotoryy vosstanovil chistuyu, pryamuyu religiyu Ibrakhima
